ENGAGEMENT_1.title: Arena challenge for you: {THEME_NAME}
ENGAGEMENT_1.body: Are you the undisputed champion? Challenge other experts on the topic and prove your knowledge!

ENGAGEMENT_2.title: Today's arenas are ready!
ENGAGEMENT_2.body: Thrilling challenges await you—enter the arena and be the last gladiator standing!

RETENTION_1.title: It's been a long time since you trained your mind!
RETENTION_1.body: There's a prize waiting to be claimed

RETENTION_2.title: It's quiz time!
RETENTION_2.body: The other players are waiting for you in your World! Challenge them now!

RETENTION_3.title: New theme {THEME_NAME} added
RETENTION_3.body: Congratulations, a new theme is now unlocked and shareable in the shop!

RETENTION_4.title: Less than a day left until the season ends!
RETENTION_4.body: The other league players are climbing the leaderboard!

RETENTION_5.title: You have advanced to the {LEAGUE_NAME} league!
RETENTION_5.body: Welcome to the new league! You have rewards to claim!

RETENTION_6.title: You have stayed afloat this season!
RETENTION_6.body: You are still in the {LEAGUE_NAME} league! Get ready for some quizzes!

RETENTION_7.title: Oh no! You're about to be relegated!
RETENTION_7.body: But don't worry, you still have a chance to save yourself and keep all your progress!

REFERRAL_1.title: Invite a friend!
REFERRAL_1.body: Prove that you are the undisputed quiz master!

REFERRAL_2.title: {USERNAME} wants to challenge you!
REFERRAL_2.body: Jump into the game now and win the VS Friends match!

REVIEW.title: Are you having fun with Witz?
REVIEW.body: Leave a great review and help us grow!

home.leagueInfo: This is your League performances! Earn Delta Points based on your answers in VS Mode and climb the leaderboard to advance to the next league!
home.tgInfo: Answer correctly in VS Mode to advance through the Training Ground! Reach the end of the path and unlock your first League!

game.vsWorldInfo: Face random opponents from around the world in a series of questions. Whoever gets the highest score at the end of the match will be the winner!
game.vsFriendsInfo: Face your friends in a private match. Whoever gets the highest score at the end of the match will be the winner!

gameTypePage.title: How do you want to start?

createMatchBtn.title: create match
createMatchBtn.body: Create a private lobby and invite your friends

joinMatchBtn.title: join match
joinMatchBtn.body: Enter a game code to join an existing match

roundAmountPage.title: select round number
roundAmountPage.body: How many rounds do you want to play?

codePage.title: enter the match code
codePage.body: ask the host for the 5 digit code to join the match

matchLanguageSheet.title: match language
matchLanguageSheet.body: you can change the language of this match

recapPage.deltaTokenInfo: You can earn or lose Delta Tokens based on your performance during the match. A correct answer gives you one token, a wrong one takes one from you. Use the Shield power to protect you from losing tokens!
recapPage.correctAnswersInfo: Correct answers allow you to advance in the Training Ground ladder and unlock rewards.

remove_ads_1m.title: Remove all ads
remove_ads_1m.description: Remove ads at the end of the match for 30 days. @:pages.shop.remove_ads.notes
remove_ads_1m.notes: NOTE: Does not apply to ads with rewards.

themes.title: themes
themes.info: Personalise your game with your favourite topics!
themes.allUnlocked: You unlocked all themes for this category

gems.title: gems
gems.info: Use Gems to buy special items and upgrades!

hearts.title: hearts
hearts.info: You need Hearts to play matches; don't run out!

power_ups.title: power-ups
power_ups.info: Activate boosts to help you win tough rounds!

themes.witzMasteryInfo: Unlock themes in this category to increase your WITZ Mastery. Complete the bar to earn a special prize!
themes.themeDetailBody: Test yourself on the {} theme with questionl like

body.locked: Buy the theme to unlock this mission

themeMasterySheet.congratsButtonText: You unlocked the final mastery level
themeMasterySheet.missionSubtext: Complete this mission to unlock the next mastery level
themeMasterySheet.missionInfo: Complete this mission to unlock the next mastery level of this theme!

mission.one: Give 1 correct answer on this theme
mission.other: Give {} correct answers on this theme

themeMasterySheet.congratulationsBody: You unlocked the final mastery level!

witzMasterySheet.body: Unlock {} themes of this category to get a special reward

league.info: This is your current League. Finish the season in the top 10 to get promoted! The last 5 will relegate to the previous League.

welcomePage.title: You made it to the leagues

1.title: Climb the ranks
1.body: Compete in a ranked League and earn Delta Points throughout the Season. Your position on the leaderboard determines your fate!

2.title: Earn Delta Points
2.body: Delta Points determine your League ranking! Your score is based on the difference between correct and wrong answers—so every match counts!

3.title: Season progression
3.body: Each Season is timed! At the end, the top 10% of players move up, the bottom 10% move down, and the rest stay in their League.

4.title: Get rewards
4.body: Higher ranks mean better rewards! Keep climbing to reach the top and unlock bigger prizes in the best Leagues.

tg.title: Training ground
tg.info: Give correct answers in VS Mode to advance the ladder and access your first League!

1.title: Prove your skills
1.body: Before joining the ranked Leagues, complete the Training Ground. Advance through the path by proving your skills!

2.title: Progress by playing
2.body: Answer correctly in “VS World” and “VS Friends” modes to move forward. Each correct answer brings you closer to your first League.

3.title: Unlock rewards
3.body: Along the way, earn special rewards as you progress. Reach the end of the path to enter your first ranked League and get even better rewards!

startZone.title: Start Zone
startZone.body: Give correct answers to advance the ladder and Access your first league

arena.body: Test your knowledge with these time-limited events and get rewards!
arena.info: In Arena mode, play timed events and test your skills! Answer as many questions as you can without making a mistake. One error and you're out!

1.title: Enter the arena
1.body: Compete in daily themed challenges against all players. Each day brings new themes to test your knowledge!

2.title: Stay in the game
2.body: Answer as many questions as possible without mistakes. One wrong answer, and you're out—so think carefully!

3.title: Get a second chance
3.body: You can use Gems to revive and keep playing, or try again for a better score and climb the leaderboard!

badges.title: badges
badges.info: View the badges of the thems you unlocked and showcase your favourite on your profile!
badges.sheetBody: Select a badge to set it as your favourite

stats.title: witz stats
stats.info: Check your all-time stats! How good have you been?

nameSheet.title: Player Name
nameSheet.body: Your player name will be visible to all players. Please choose a name not offensive to any player.

settingsSheet.title: settings
settingsSheet.languageSheetBody: Select the language of the app

profile.removeDialogBody: Do you want to remove this player from your friend list?

weeklyChallenge.title: Weekly missions
weeklyChallenge.info: Complete daily missions to fill the weekly challenge bar—unlock bigger rewards based on how many missions you complete in a week.
weeklyChallenge.body: Complete daily missions and unlock the rewards!

game.roundSpotlightInfo: Each match has a theme! Each round's question will be based on a category related to this theme.

dialogPowers.title: Boost your score!
dialogPowers.body1: Need an edge to outsmart your opponents? Use Power-Ups!
dialogPowers.body2: Each one offers a unique advantage to help you score big and stay on top.

game.rocketSpotlightInfo: Use Points X2 to double your round score. It boosts both correct and incorrect answers, so use it wisely!
game.eraserSpotlightInfo: Use 50/50 to eliminate two incorrect options. It's great for narrowing down tough choices!
game.peekSpotlightInfo: Use Peek Opponents to see what others are answering in real-time. It's perfect for gaining an edge!
game.shieldSpotlightInfo: Use Error Shield to prevent your answer from counting as wrong. A great safety net!

1.question: Which artist holds the record for the most-streamed song on Spotify?

2.question: In which TV series does the character Walter White appear?

3.question: What does a panda's diet mainly consist of?

4.question: What is the most commonly spoken language in the world?

5.question: Which planet in our solar system has the most moons?

dialogEndGame.title: Well done!
dialogEndGame.body1: That's how a match works. Now it's time to put your skills to the test against your opponents.
dialogEndGame.body2: Climb your league leaderboard and claim the victory!

dialogAuthentication.title: Save your progress!
dialogAuthentication.body: Create your profile to keep your progress safe! If you continue as a guest, all your data may be lost if you uninstall the app or log out.

tutorial.themeNavSpotlightInfo: Want to expand your trivia experience? Start by accessing the Themes section to find new themes!
tutorial.themeSpotlightInfo: Here's the WITZ Starter Pack! Select it to view its details and categories.
tutorial.buyThemeSpotlightInfo: Kickstart your journey with the WITZ Starter Pack! Unlock it for free and start playing!

dialogEndTutorial.title: You're ready to play!
dialogEndTutorial.body1: It's time to dive into the game, challenge opponents, and climb the leaderboard.

step1.title: Choose your player name
step1.body: Your player name will be visible to all players. Please choose a name not offensive to any player.
step1.invalidWarning: This name goes against our community policies. Please change it to another player name.

step2.title: Choose your avatar
step2.invalidWarning: The image you uploaded was deemed offensive according to our guidelines.

step3.title: What are your favourite topics?
step3.body: Choose your favourite topics to have a personalized gaming experience.

gem.info: Use Gems to buy special items and upgrades!

heart.info: You need Hearts to play matches; don't run out!

rocket.name: double points
rocket.info: For one round, doubles your round points! But beware! It works both positevely and negatively.

bomb.info: For one round, erases two wrong answers immediatly.

peek.name: peek opponents
peek.info: For one round, take a peek at what your opponents are responding to.

shield.name: error shield
shield.info: For one round, a wrong answer does not count as an error.
